bodyV2.markdown:
If you buy a ticket that is less than the value of the voucher, your eVoucher will retain the price difference, allowing you to spend the rest at another time.

For example, if you have a voucher worth £100 and your tickets cost £80, you will have £20 left on the eVoucher to spend on other tickets.

content.name: What if the tickets I buy cost less than the value of the voucher?
